attributes.action: Give D-day veteran Harry Billinge a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: I have created a petition on change. Org and currently I have over 400 signatures in 24 hours.
attributes.background: Harry is a D-day veteran and has worked selflessly all his life to raise money for charity.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
